display_long_description:
DeadSplash is a fast-paced arcade zombie wave shooter set in the heart of 1980s downtown Los Angeles. What begins as a loud, sun-soaked pool party quickly descends into chaos as the dead rise from the streets below. The bass of the music fades into screams, the water runs red, and the survivors realize there’s only one rule left—fight or die.
Players step into the shoes of partygoers turned survivors, armed with whatever they can find to hold back the relentless tide. Pistols, shotguns, plasma rifles, and the roaring chainsaw become tools of pure survival, shredding through waves of the undead in a haze of blood, smoke, and adrenaline. Every kill brings points, and every point pushes you closer to unlocking new gear, traps, and upgrades to keep the horde at bay..
Each round grows deadlier. What starts as a trickle of slow-moving corpses soon becomes an unstoppable flood of sprinting, snarling undead. Mutated brutes smash through barriers, fast movers leap across the pool deck, and grotesque boss creatures bring new horrors each night. The city skyline burns in the background, helicopters circle aimlessly, and you realize there’s no help coming, only the next wave!
Welcome to DeadSplash, a relentless, blood-soaked arcade shooter where the party’s never over, the dead don’t stop coming, and survival is the only victory that matters.
